Sentencas: Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) anodes were fabricated with NiO-YSZ and 0-10 wt% aluminum titanate (Al2TiO5, ALT) addition.
Titulo: Effect of aluminum titanate on the fracture mechanism of the nickel-zirconia system under uniaxial and biaxial strength testing conditions

Sentencas: Samples were manufactured using a tape casting procedure to a thickness of approximately 500 mu m. A remarkable enhancement of the mechanical strength, up to 166%, was found when compared to the samples without ALT addition.
Titulo: Effect of aluminum titanate on the fracture mechanism of the nickel-zirconia system under uniaxial and biaxial strength testing conditions

Sentencas: The development of secondary phases was observed proportional to the amount of aluminum titanate.
Titulo: Effect of aluminum titanate on the fracture mechanism of the nickel-zirconia system under uniaxial and biaxial strength testing conditions

Sentencas: Mechanical properties evaluation was conducted using uniaxial and biaxial strength testing.
Titulo: Effect of aluminum titanate on the fracture mechanism of the nickel-zirconia system under uniaxial and biaxial strength testing conditions

Sentencas: Weibull statistics was used for mechanical properties analysis and an advanced statistical analysis was employed to identify the existence of multiple flaw populations.
Titulo: Effect of aluminum titanate on the fracture mechanism of the nickel-zirconia system under uniaxial and biaxial strength testing conditions

Sentencas: Fractography was performed on selected samples to elucidate the fracture mechanisms.
Titulo: Effect of aluminum titanate on the fracture mechanism of the nickel-zirconia system under uniaxial and biaxial strength testing conditions

Sentencas: Biaxial testing was characterized by high mechanical strength with lower Weibull moduli; whereas, uniaxial testing showed lower mechanical strength and higher Weibull moduli.
Titulo: Effect of aluminum titanate on the fracture mechanism of the nickel-zirconia system under uniaxial and biaxial strength testing conditions

Sentencas: It was found that the addition of 0%, 5% and 10% ALT to Ni-YSZ samples exhibit a fracture mechanism that is dependent on one flaw population namely porosity and mechanical strength of secondary phases, respectively.
Titulo: Effect of aluminum titanate on the fracture mechanism of the nickel-zirconia system under uniaxial and biaxial strength testing conditions

Sentencas: Samples without the addition of ALT were characterized by intergranular fracture while transgranular fracture was found for the addition of 5% and 10% ALT to Ni-YSZ samples.
Titulo: Effect of aluminum titanate on the fracture mechanism of the nickel-zirconia system under uniaxial and biaxial strength testing conditions

Sentencas: For the addition of 1% ALT to Ni-YSZ samples both flaw populations were identified.
Titulo: Effect of aluminum titanate on the fracture mechanism of the nickel-zirconia system under uniaxial and biaxial strength testing conditions

Sentencas: Analysis of the fracture surfaces revealed the simultaneous presence of intergranular and transgranular features.
Titulo: Effect of aluminum titanate on the fracture mechanism of the nickel-zirconia system under uniaxial and biaxial strength testing conditions

Sentencas: It is proposed that secondary phases, developed by ALT addition, increase the mechanical strength of the material shifting the fracture mechanism from intergranular to transgranular.
Titulo: Effect of aluminum titanate on the fracture mechanism of the nickel-zirconia system under uniaxial and biaxial strength testing conditions
